meanings.definition: A printed heading on stationery stating a person or organization's name and address.
meanings.sent1: The letterhead at the top of the page had the company's logo and contact details.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to use the official letterhead for important business correspondence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the letterhead to write a note to the birds in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a letterhead, bright and welcoming to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The bold letterhead stood out, making the document look professional and trustworthy.

meanings.definition: The paper used for such a heading.
meanings.sent1: The quality of the letterhead paper made the documents look more official.
meanings.sent2: She ran her fingers over the smooth texture of the letterhead before writing her letter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the letterhead paper to create a tiny hat for itself.
meanings.sent4: The letterhead paper whispered secrets of important meetings and decisions made.
meanings.sent5: The elegant letterhead paper added a touch of class to the business presentation.
